# CreateApiRequest

Information about the API.

**Properties**

| Name        | Type   | Required | Description                                               |
| :---------- | :----- | :------- | :-------------------------------------------------------- |
| name        | string | ✅       | The API's name.                                           |
| summary     | string | ❌       | The API's short summary.                                  |
| description | string | ❌       | The API's description. This supports Markdown formatting. |
